'''Damien Bador''' is a French engineer, specialist in [[languages]] and tongues in Middle-earth. He has written numerous essays on the invented languages of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]. He is also translator and editor. He is the editor of [[L'Arc et le Heaume (Special Issue) 3|a special of the fanzine ''L'arc et le Heaume'']] dedicated to the [[Christianity|Catholic]] prayers translated in [[Elvish]].
